=====================
 coopr.age CHANGELOG
=====================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Non-functional changes; reformatting.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Removed support for a 'mipgap' button.

- Added a CooprAge script to launch this GUI.

- Misc bug fixes. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Initial release.
